item.title: @elonmusk: It seems as though immigration and voter ID laws are the two biggest issues for each party right now...
item.description: It seems as though immigration and voter ID laws are the two biggest issues for each party right now. One side is fighting for unchecked immigration and no voter ID. item.description: ğŸš¨ This woman nails it while Legacy media ignores it. â€œDid you guys hear about the illegal immigrant that was arrested in Georgia yesterday for brutally raping an 11-year-old girl at knifepoint and forcing her ten year old little sister to watch after breaking into their bedroom?
